sentences.en: Countries differ greatly in determining taxable earnings.
sentences.cn: 各国对哪些收入应纳税的决定差别很大.

sentences.en: For example, clothing, cigarettes, soda, gasoline are taxable items.
sentences.cn: 举例来说, 衣服 、 烟 、 汽水和汽油都打税物品.

sentences.en: Individual income tax for personal gain, is all sorts of taxable income.
sentences.cn: 个人所得税, 就是对个人获得的各种应税所得征收的一种税.

sentences.en: It is taxable, though, if you identify your estate as the beneficiary.
sentences.cn: 如果你按受益人确定你的遗产,尽管它是要课税的, 也不用交税.

sentences.en: It is worth consulting the guide to see whether your income is taxable.
sentences.cn: 值得查一下这本手册看看你的收入是否该纳税。

sentences.en: Only a complete gift is taxable under the gift tax.
sentences.cn: 根据赠与税规定,只有完全赠与才应纳税.

sentences.en: Only about one - quarter of eligible taxable buildings were on the tax roll.
sentences.cn: 大约只有四分之一的可收税建筑在税收记录中.

sentences.en: Tax Considerations. The proprietorship itself is not a taxable entity.
sentences.cn: 税收斟酌独资企业本身并非纳税实体.

sentences.en: Taxable year: Gregorian Calendar year in which the income is derived.
sentences.cn: 纳税年度: 填写取得所得的公历年度.

sentences.en: That company takes in between $ 25000 and 50000 of taxable income yearly.
sentences.cn: 那家公司每年有2.5万至5万美元的需纳税收入.

sentences.en: The business profits that non - profit making organizations earn are taxable.
sentences.cn: 非 营利组织的营利性收入也要缴税.

sentences.en: The money is deductible from taxable income.
sentences.cn: 这笔款项可从应征税的公司收入中扣除.

sentences.en: The new rules make it legal and, of course; taxable.
sentences.cn: 新的规定使它合法化, 当然应当交税.

sentences.en: The tax currently payable is based on taxable profit for the year.
sentences.cn: 现时应付税项乃按本年度应课税溢利计算.

sentences.en: Where payments exceed these limits they become fully taxable.
sentences.cn: 付款额超过这些限度就得全部纳税.

sentences.en: Whether from legal or illegal sources, income is taxable.
sentences.cn: 不管是从合法的还是非法的途径获得的, 有收入就应当交税.

words.tran_cn: [税收] 可课税性；可征税性

trans.tran_en: if money that you receive is taxable, you have to pay tax on it
